An institute of computer education is running by society named FUTECH IIT (Institute of Information Technology) Garh Road Shahjahanpur-Kithore Distt Meerut. At institute poor students is also studying free of cost. Society adopted 20 students of muslim minority community for free education. We arranged a program in which we gave honor of position holder students and distributes the price for excellent programance in the exam on the base of their percentage. Society working on youth affairs and provide students study material free of cost to poor and intelligent students. On 15 August 2013 society distribute study material and prize to intelligent students of local area colleges and schools. Society provides free coaching to poor students and give him tips for their future plan. We are running the program of social awareness and cultural programs. In 18-07-2013 management committee of society take a decision to open a 10th standard Urdu Medium School for muslim education. Time to time society running a program of Promotion of Urdu Language and give the Urdu education to other castes. Society members is also take partition in social working programs. We praised to the teachers who had already taught institute of society is working is in the field of education and awareness diligently the area and we want to spread it over the countery. In this way we want to make and educational hub. In the field of computer literacy we offered huge discount on the purchase of Dual core computer for students.

ngoName: Kunwar Ram Bux Singh Educational Society
address: Kunwar Ram Bux Singh Educational Society, Tehsil- Hassanganj, Unnao (U.P)- 209841
title: Kunwar Ram Bux Singh Educational Society
detailsOfAchievement: Society have 5 school and colleges in running in Tehsil Hasanganj, Unnao (U.P.) by which society provide quality, employment oriented education, organized sports, cultural activities, debate and seminar on different social evils to educate the rural youth, in addition to the school and college provide free of cost education to the students coming from the poor families.Near about 70 percent population of the country still live in the villages whose main occupation is agriculture or its related areas. The main problem faced by the rural mass is illiteracy, lack of scientific knowledge about crop cultivation and absence of good storage structure in case of huge harvest which leads to huge post harvest loss and deterioting economic condition of the farmer. To address these problems the society have established Virendra Kumar Singh Krishi Vigyan Kendra at Dhaura, Unnao (U.P.) in 4th November 1999, funded by Indian Council of Agricultural Research, New Delhi. In addition to this five school/colleges (one dedicated to girl Sabha Kumari Inter College) have been established in Tehsil Hasanganj, Unnao to impart quality and employment oriented education to the rural children.The novelties of the activities being run by Kunwar Ram Bux Singh Educational Society are as follows. Focus on enhancing production of agricultural and horticultural crops through different activities like training, demonstration, on farm trails, gosthies, awareness camps, seed distribution, exposure visits etc . Work for upliftment of rural population especially weaker section, SC/ST population and women sector through different DBT sponsored projects. Promoted organic farming through vermicomposting, vermiwash, NADAP compost, green manuring and bio formulations. Promotion of livestock was done by skill development oriented trainings, Artificial insemination, animal health camps and immunization programmes.â€‹
